Description / Source: Major Sherpa Buddhist festival with cham (masked) dances; widely attended by trekkers. (Trekking Planner (P.) Ltd.)
Temple attracts large crowds during Dashain and special pujas on Ashtami; regular pujas & monthlies. (Wikipedia)

Event Name: Koshi Tappu Bird-Watch Season / Bird Festival (historic)
Location (District/Place): Koshi Tappu, Saptari / Sunsari border area
Month / Season: Oct–Mar (migratory bird season); historic Bird Festivals held in Feb (past editions)
Description / Source: Annual bird-watching season with organized birding tours; past bird festival editions recorded. (Explore Himalaya Travel & Adventure)
Festival to promote Nepali tea — stalls, tastings, cultural shows (Ilam hosted Intl. Tea Festival June 8–10, 2024). (The Annapurna Express)

Event Name: Bhedetar Seasonal Hillfair (proposed / local seasonal fair)
Description / Source: No single formal annual festival found online for Bhedetar; local hill fairs & weekend events commonly occur in rhododendron / spring season — recommended as a proposed event for your dataset. (proposed — based on local tourism practice).
Traditional Limbu harvest festival celebrated across Limbu communities (Chasok Tangnam). (Wikipedia)

Venue: Hile Bazaar / Cholung Park / community grounds
Description / Source: Mangshire and related Aathpahariya cultural activities and Lakhey/Newar performances happen in Dhankuta/Hile region — local cultural week packages promote this. (royalmt.com.np)

Attraction: Rhododendron Bloom Spots (TMJ / Milke Danda region)
Event Name: TMJ Rhododendron Season Walk & Community Festival (proposed / seasonal)
Description / Source: TMJ ridge is “Rhododendron Capital”; many community treks & seasonal activities occur during bloom — specific local festivals exist informally; where formal events are held they’re scheduled in spring. (mixed: trekking sources & local event proposals). (Nepal Holidays)

Event Name: Didi-Baini Picnic & Nature Day (proposed / seasonal local fair)
Location (District/Place): (local village near waterfall — depends on exact Didi-Baini site)
Venue: Waterfall access clearing / village common ground
Description / Source: No formal large-scale event found; many waterfalls host local picnic days and community gatherings in peak season — proposed event for dataset.

Event Name: Barun Valley Trekker Season & Conservation Days (proposed)
Location (District/Place): Barun Valley / Makalu region (Sankhuwasabha / Solukhumbu approach)
Description / Source: Barun Valley is a trekking destination; conservation awareness days and guided trek seasons are the main “events” — formal festivals are rare; entry is usually as part of trekking itinerary. (proposed / practical).

Venue: Park entrance / local village community halls
Description / Source: Park and NGOs host occasional conservation / awareness events; large public festivals tied to the park are not common — proposed entry recommended.

Event Name: Triveni Dham Mela / Pilgrimage Fair (Triveni Mela)
Month / Season: Maghe Sankranti / Makar Sankranti / other festive days (Jan)
Description / Source: Pilgrimage gatherings and melas happen at Triveni Dham during key Hindu festival dates; local pilgrim fairs are historically recorded. (Triveni Dham pilgrimage activity: local sources).

Event Name: Sherpa / Everest region cultural events — Gyalpo Losar & Mani Rimdu access
Description / Source: Gyalpo Losar (Sherpa New Year) and Mani Rimdu are the major cultural events which visitors combine with viewpoint visits; Thamserku viewpoint is visited during these periods. (Trek me Nepal)

Event Name: Taplejung Local Temple Jatra / Puja Day (proposed / local jatra)
Month / Season: Local auspicious days and major festivals (Dashain / Tihar)
Description / Source: Small temples in Taplejung typically host annual jatras and special pujas during national festivals; no single widely publicized event for this micro-temple found online — proposed local jatra.

Event Name: Hile Viewpoint Nature Day & Cultural Fair (proposed)
Description / Source: No specific formal event found online tied to the tiny viewpoint; local tourism groups run viewpoint visits and weekend fairs. (proposed).
Small waterfalls in Sankhuwasabha attract local visitors seasonally; formal festivals are rare — proposed.

Event Name: Kanchenjunga Celebration / Yatra Days (local celebrations & trekking windows)
Month / Season: Spring & Autumn trekking seasons; some local rituals in Oct–Nov
Description / Source: Kanchenjunga area has local rituals and seasonal trekking events; formal base-camp festivals are uncommon but trekking seasons define the activity. (practical/observed trekking season info).

Event Name: Ilam Tea Festival satellite events / Homestay Cultural Days
Description / Source: Homestays participate in Ilam Tea Festival with tea tasting sessions & cultural programs; homestay-hosted activity days often accompany the main festival. (The Annapurna Express)

Event Name: Thulung Dudhkoshi Cultural Trek Days (proposed / seasonal)
Description / Source: The Thulung Dudhkoshi route is primarily a trekking/cultural route; no single documented festival specific to the whole route — proposed trekking-season events.
Hot springs in eastern Nepal host seasonal visitors and occasional wellness weekends; specific annual events are not widely publicized — proposed.

Event Name: Makalu Trekker Season & Community Day (proposed / trekking window)

Event Name: Sabhapokhari Local Jatra & Lake Day (proposed / community festival)

Event Name: TMJ Rhododendron Trekking Festival / Rhododendron Week
